'''14w28b''' is the thirty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on July 10, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140715113521/https://mojang.com/2014/07/minecraft-snapshot-14w28a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w28b|date=July 9, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|487243708757467136|Minecraft snapshot 14w28b has been released to fix many things. Like, many. A whole bunch. Lots. Go see!|July 10, 2014}}</ref> to some of bugs and crashes in [[14w28a]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Monster Spawner JE2.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Monster Spawner|Monster Spawners]]'''
* Can be right-clicked with a [[spawn egg]] in hand, to change what the spawner produces.
